mapper.select: SELECT /* com.ceragem.batch.crm.dao.GrpCoupnIssueDao.getGrdCouponList */ A.MSHIP_COUPN_BAS_NO , A.CYCLE_CD , B.MSHIP_PLCY_BAS_NO , B.MSHIP_GRADE_CD , B.MSHP_GRADE_CD , B.CPRT_CMP_NO , A.COUPN_TYPE_CD , B.MSHIP_PLCY_NM , A.PRV_QNTY , B.APPLY_STD_STA_YMD , B.APPLY_STD_END_YMD , C.COUPN_BAS_NM , C.use_std_day_cond_cd , C.FROM_PBLS_STD_DAY , C.TO_PBLS_STD_DAY , C.COUPN_ISSUE_METH_CD , C.MAX_ISSUE_CNT FROM CRM_MSHIP_APPLY_COUPN_REL A LEFT JOIN CRM_MSHIP_PLCY_BAS B ON A.MSHIP_PLCY_BAS_NO = B.MSHIP_PLCY_BAS_NO LEFT JOIN CRM_MSHIP_COUPN_BAS C ON A.MSHIP_COUPN_BAS_NO = C.MSHIP_COUPN_BAS_NO WHERE /* A.CYCLE_CD='002' AND */ B.STATUS_CD='Y' AND ( B.APPLY_STD_STA_YMD <= TO_CHAR( SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND B.APPLY_STD_END_YMD >= TO_CHAR( SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') ) AND ( C.FROM_PBLS_STD_DAY <= TO_CHAR( SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND C.TO_PBLS_STD_DAY >= TO_CHAR( SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') ) AND B.MSHIP_GRADE_CD = #{mshipGradeCd}

SELECT TEM.* , CUST.CUST_NM , DAMO.DECRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256',CUST.MPHON_NO ,'') AS MPHON_NO FROM ( SELECT B.MSHIP_COUPN_BAS_NO , B.COUPN_BAS_NM , A.COUPN_PBLS_BAS_NO , A.USE_YN , A.ITG_CUST_NO , A.FROM_USE_STD_DAY , A.TO_USE_STD_DAY , A.USE_STD_DAY_COND_CD , A.COUPN_USE_POSS_DAY , TO_CHAR(A.REG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DT , CASE WHEN A.USE_STD_DAY_COND_CD = 'Y' THEN TO_CHAR(A.REG_DT + A.COUPN_USE_POSS_DAY , 'YYYY-MM-DD') ELSE TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.TO_USE_STD_DAY,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') END COND_TO_DT FROM CRM_COUPN_PBLS_HST A JOIN CRM_MSHIP_COUPN_BAS B ON A.MSHIP_COUPN_BAS_NO = B.MSHIP_COUPN_BAS_NO AND A.USE_YN = 'N' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.ITG_CUST_NO IS NOT NULL ) TEM JOIN CRM_CUST_BAS CUST ON TEM.ITG_CUST_NO = CUST.ITG_CUST_NO WHERE TEM.COND_TO_DT IS NOT NULL AND TEM.COND_TO_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + 8 , 'YYYY-MM-DD')
